Segment.name: TD4
Segment.comment: To specify transportation special handling requirements, or hazardous materials information, or both

Field.name: SpecialHandlingCode
Field.comment: Code specifying special transportation handling instructions

Field.name: HazardousMaterialCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code which qualifies the Hazardous Material Class Code (209)

Field.name: HazardousMaterialClassCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the kind of hazard for a material

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

SyntaxNote.name: R010204
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of TD401, TD402 or TD404 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0203
SyntaxNote.comment: If TD402 is present, then TD403 is required.
